
attach-network-interface
************************


DESCRIPTION
===========


SYNOPSIS
========

   aws ec2 attach-network-interface
     --instance-id <value>
     --device-index <value>
     --network-interface-id <value>


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
===================

"--instance-id"  (string)

"--device-index"  (integer)

"--network-interface-id"  (string)


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
===================

None
